name: Magnatesage Technologies
description:
Established in 2009, Magnates Technologies have decades of combined experience building and operating multiple digital development firms.
As a leading mobile applications development company, we admit that our niche services in mobile application development consulting and technology harnessing are fuelled by technical and creative innovation to become a specialist provider of end-to-end solutions.
We kept ourselves updated with changing landscape in the mobile computing industry and as the time came.
Today, we are one of the recognized names in app development with absolute authority in developing, delivering and deploying applications across all major Mobile Platforms.
Magnates Technologies had served 100+ global clients over 7+ years with 200+ full-time top enterprise app developers & mobile application development experts. 
Industries & Types of Apps :
Enterprise Apps 
VoIP Apps 
Entertainment Apps    
Educational Apps    
GPS Navigation    
Lifestyle Apps 
Healthcare Apps 
Social Media Apps    
Networking Apps    
Travel Booking Apps    
Game Development / Re-skin 
In-App Purchases 
Services: 
UI/UX designing 
App development 
Web-services development 
Mobile apps for websites 
App uploads on respective stores
For getting free quote please visit our website
